channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why the US government is not the savior Intel needs
item.description: Intel doesn't need cash. Instead, the struggling semiconductor giant needs to figure out how to drum up interest for its foundry business.

item.title: A Radiohead song from 1997 is on the Hot 100 charts, thanks to TikTok
item.description: "Let Down" broke into the Billboard Hot 100 nearly 30 years after its release, marking just the fourth Radiohead song to enter the charts.

item.title: Anthropic Settles High-Profile AI Copyright Lawsuit Brought by Book Authors
item.description: Anthropic faced the prospect of more than $1 trillion in damages, a sum that could have threatened the company’s survival if the case went to trial.

item.title: Libby’s library app adds an AI discovery feature, and not everyone is thrilled
item.description: Libby launches "Inspire Me," a genAI feature that helps its users find books to borrow from local libraries.

item.title: Anthropic settles AI book-training lawsuit with authors
item.description: Called Bartz v. Anthropic, the case deals with Anthropic's use of books as training material for its large language models.

item.title: The 39 Best Shows on Apple TV+ Right Now (September 2025)
item.description: Platonic, The Morning Show, and Chief of War are among the best shows on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: Anthropic launches a Claude AI agent that lives in Chrome
item.description: Anthropic is the latest AI lab to offer an AI agent with the ability to view and take action in a user's Chrome browser.

item.title: Researchers Are Already Leaving Meta’s New Superintelligence Lab
item.description: CEO Mark Zuckerberg went on a recruiting blitz to lure top AI researchers to Meta. WIRED has confirmed that three recent hires have now resigned.

item.title: Looking to Buy a Window Air Conditioner? Read This First
item.description: From environmental and safety concerns to noise and filters, there’s a lot to think about before buying a window AC. Our air quality expert walks you ...

item.title: Sonos Era 300 Sale: The Big Sonos Speaker Is 20 Percent Off
item.description: Our editors’ favorite surround sound Sonos speaker is matching its lowest price ever from Amazon.
